title: Supernatural Energy Template
description: Defines a supernatural energy source -- its appearance, properties, occurrence conditions, relation to gods, and dangers. Supernatural energies should be named, located, and characterized for consistency.

appearance.description: What it looks like when present

detection_range.description: How far away it can be detected and by what means

control_methods.description: How it can be controlled or harnessed

type.description: Type or classification of this supernatural energy

availability.description: How available or accessible this energy is

feel.description: What this energy feels like when encountered (tingling, warmth, dread, etc.)

intensity.description: Intensity levels and how they manifest

special.description: Special properties or unique characteristics of this energy

x-cross-references.god-profile: Gods may be the source of this energy
x-cross-references.magic-system-overview: Magic systems may draw on this energy
x-cross-references.phenomenon-catalog: Locations of this energy may be phenomena
